bibtex_ref:
@article{haastad1999pseudorandom,
title={A pseudorandom generator from any one-way function},
author={H{\aa}stad, Johan and Impagliazzo, Russell and Levin, Leonid A and Luby, Michael},
journal={SIAM Journal on Computing},
volume={28},
number={4},
pages={1364--1396},
year={1999},
publisher={SIAM}}
long_description: If one-way functions exist, then pseudorandom generators exist.  A PRG with input length $n^8$ can be constructed generically from a OWF of input length $n$
